alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Chilton; Greene; Hale; Perry; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 1:29PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Chilton, northern Perry, southwestern Shelby, east central Greene, Hale and Bibb Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 128 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wilton to Sawyerville. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Calera, Montevallo, Brent, Marion, Centreville, Jemison, Greensboro, Thorsby, West Blocton, Wilton, Akron, Newbern, American Village, Brierfield Ironworks Park, Low Gap, Mertz, Sawyerville, University Of Montevallo, Talladega National Forest and Eoline. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bibb; Chilton; Greene; Hale; Perry; Shelby
